descriptor.name: Icemagic Pro 192L 4 Star Single Door Refrigerator with Base Drawer
descriptor.short_desc:
* Upto 7 days of Garden Freshness
 
 * Upto 12 hours of milk preservation in case of power cuts
 
 * MicroBlock technology prevents 99% bacterial growth and keeps the freshness intact for longer.
 
 * No. 1 in Ice Making
 
 * CRESCENT DOOR DESIGN AND BREATHE ARC HANDLE* - The design has been envisaged keeping consumers at the heart of every decision making. Built with utmost precision & craftsmanship, it is designed to be a timeless centerpiece in every household. With a revolutionary design & superior refrigeration technology, it is a benchmark of consumer experience in single door refrigerators.
 
 * NUMBER 1 IN ICE-MAKING* - With The New Laminar Air Flow and the advanced Insulated Capillary Technology and powerful compressor in Whirlpool refrigerators makes ice faster than any other products in its class - so that you are never short of ice. Tested vs. major products available in this segment. Results basis ml/min. of ice making.
 
 * INTELLISENSE INVERTER TECHNOLOGY~ - With VDE Certification for 25 Years Whirlpool's IntelliSense Inverter Technology, with energy efficient inverter compressors, comes with low starting voltage of 95V & assures 25 years of compressor reliability - certified by VDE Germany.* - As Certified by VDE Germany ~.
 
 * 12 HOURS^* OF MILK PRESERVATION EVEN DURING POWER CUT* - The magic chiller and laminar air flow ensure that your milk does not spoil even after 12 hours^ of power cut. ^ Product operating at highest cooling setting with restricted usage wherein Ph value of milk packet maintained above 6.4.
 
 * UP TO 7 DAYS OF GARDEN FRESHNESS*@ - With Moisture Control System and Micro Block The Whirlpool IceMagic Fresh refrigerator keeps fruits and vegetables fresh for up to 7 days and preserve milk for up to 12 hours^ even during power cuts. Powered by MicroBlock Technology, these refrigerators prevent up to 99%* bacterial growth. 
 
 * MICROBLOCK TECHNOLOGY - MicroBlockTM technology prevents 99%* bacterial growth and keeps the freshness intact for longer.
 
 * AUTO-CONNECT TO HOME INVERTER - In the event of a power outage, it automatically connects to the home inverter, thus delivering consistent cooling and maintaining long-lasting freshness. - Auto-connect to >=2.5KVA inverter connected to power switch.
 
 * INSULATED CAPILLARY TECHNOLOGY - In Insulated Capillary Technology, the capillary which carries the refrigerant from the compressor to the freezer is surrounded by super cold gas leading to benefits such better compressor efficiency, faster cooling and 9 Hours* cooling retention in the refrigerator.
 
 * MAGIC CHILLER - The all new magic chiller with easy slide action, that chills your bottles quickly.
 
 * LARGE VEGETABLE CRISPER - In this Single Door Fridge you get a Extra Large Vegetable Crisper that will ensure that you never run out of space while storing your vegetables in the fridge.
 
 * STABILIZER FREE OPERATION* - Whirlpool Refrigerators can stably operate even in high fluctuation of voltage (95V-300V) and do not require a separate stabilizer.
 
 * 10 YEAR WARRANTY* - With Whirlpool refrigerators you are guaranteed a long-lasting quality product with a 10 year warranty on the compressor. * Only on Compressor. T&C Apply.
 
 * PEDESTAL STORAGE - For your storage needs, this refrigerator comes with an additional pedestal drawer. It's an ideal space for storing dry items like potatoes, onions etc.
 
 * IN THE BOX CONTENTS - 1 Egg Tray, 2 Ice Tray, 1 Instruction Manual, 1 Key 
 
 * CONTACT US - Email - wstore@whirlpool.com | Toll Free - 1800 208 1800
 
 *FREE DELIVERY AND EXPRESS INSTALLATION
 
 *REPLACEMENT POLICY - Any request for replacement of a Product that was damaged at the time of Delivery should be made within 5 days of Delivery. Product will be replaced by the Seller as per Brand’s replacment policy.

descriptor.name: Ace XL 11 Kg 5 Star Semi Automatic Washing Machine
descriptor.short_desc:
* Wash upto 10 king size bedsheets at one go
 
 * Removes upto 10 tough stains
 
 * 3D Turbo Impeller
 
 * 3D Lint Filter
 
 * Hard Water Wash
 
 * 5 wash programs
 
 * 3D LINT FILTER - 3D Lint filter with unique triple layered filtration process allows effective collection of lint so that clothes come out clean & fresh after every wash.
 
 * 3D TURBO IMPELLER - 3D Turbo Impeller with rotary stem & 3D scrub pads provides perfect triple motion for clothes to remove dirt effectively.
 
 * 1400 RPM SPIN MOTOR - High RPM speed spin motor ensures superior & faster drying of even a heavy load of laundry.
 
 * WATERPROOF & SHOCKPROOF CONTROL PANEL - Now keep your machine anywhere you feel like without worrying about water spillage on the control panel damaging your machine.
 
 * 10 YEAR WARRANTY - Get complete peace of mind with 10 years warranty on Wash Motor + Prime Mover & 5 years warranty on Spin Moto.
 
 * IF DESIGN AWARD - Winner of coveted iF Design Award 2019, one of the world's foremost design competitions.
 
 * REMOVE 40 TOUGH STAINS* - Powered by 3D Scrub technology it removes tough stains with ease.
 
 * WASHES UP TO 10 KING SIZE BED SHEETS - With the cutting edge 3D Scrub Technology, now you can wash multiple loads of laundry at once.
 
 * 5 WASH PROGRAMS - The machine has 5 different wash programs(Delicate, Normal, Gentle, Stain wash & Anti Bacterial Wash) ensuring a safe and customized wash for every fabric type. You can choose these modes/wash programs according to your wash needs.
 
 * LARGE WHEEL - Fitted with a big wheels so that you can easily move the machine around making it more robust and stable.
 
 * HARD WATER WASH - Unique hard water wash program that gives better dirt and stain removal even in hard water conditions.
 
 * IN THE BOX CONTENTS - 1 unit washing machine, 1 unit spin cap, 1 unit drain pipe, 1 unit user manual
 
 * WARRANTY - 2 Years Comprehensive & 10 years warranty on Wash Motor + Prime Mover & 5 years warranty on Spin Motor
 
 * CONTACT US - Email: wstore@whirlpool.com | Toll Free: 1800 208 1800
 
 *FREE DELIVERY AND EXPRESS INSTALLATION
 
 *REPLACEMENT POLICY - Any request for replacement of a Product that was damaged at the time of Delivery should be made within 5 days of Delivery. Product will be replaced by the Seller as per Brand’s replacment policy.
descriptor.long_desc:
UP TO 2X FRESHNESS - with 6TH SENSE ActiveFresh TECHNOLOGY Protton world series powered by 6TH SENSE ActiveFresh Technology ensures up to 2X freshness to your fruits and vegetables - by preventing excessive ripening, maintaining their natural moisture and preventing 99% bacterial growth.
 
  3 DOOR ADVANTAGE - Protton's unique 3 door format offers benefits that no other refrigerator in its class has. It provides the largest 32 L fruits and vegetables storage space, prevents odour mixing and ensures better cooling@ retention owing to 3 separate zones for different storage needs. In separate compartment for fruits and vegetables. @When compared to a conventional double-door refrigerator.
 
  INDIA'S FIRST ACTIVE FRESH ZONE - The refrigerator's unique 3 door format gives you an exclusive bottom drawer the Active Fresh Zone for fruits and vegetables. This prevents odour mixing keeping fruits and vegetables fresher for a longer duration.
 
  ZEOLITE TECHNOLOGY - Zeolite Technology prevents excessive ripening of fruits and vegetables by absorbing ethylene emission from them. This reduces the sugar content of fruits and vegetables thereby keeping fruits and vegetables fresher for longer.
 
  MOISTURE RETENTION TECHNOLOGY - In ordinary refrigerators, the cold air comes directly in contact with fruits and vegetables and robs them of their intrinsic moisture. But in Protton world series refrigerator, the cold air flows around the compartment, keeping its contents cool while retaining their moisture and natural freshness.
 
  MICROBLOCK TECHNOLOGY - Microblock Technology-Adapts to varying internal conditions to prevent up to 99% bacterial growth, keeping fruits and vegetables fresh for longer.
 
  CUSTOMIZED COOLING TECHNOLOGY - The All new Protton comes with a customizable temperature knob for delicacies like cheese berries, chocolate and other dairy products.
 
  ENERGY EFFICIENT - As unbelievable as it is, the all new Protton world series consumes lesser energy than a CFL, making it one of the most energy efficient refrigerator in its class. T&C Apply. As compared to a 60 watt CFL.
 
  ICE TWISTER - Dispensed and collect ice cubes conveniently inside the collector box with easy twist action.
 
  AIR BOOSTER - Controls the circulation of cold air so that each compartment receives uniform cooling that it requires.
 
  32L LARGE STORAGE - This refrigerator's Active Fresh Zone for fruits and vegetables provides upto 32L of large storage space. In separate compartments for fruits and vegetables. Available in select models.
 
  IN THE BOX CONTENTS - Refrigerator, User Manual
 
  WARRANTY - 1 Year Comprehensive & 10 Years Compressor
 
  CONTACT US - Email: helpdeskindia@whirlpool.com | Toll Free: 1800 208 1800
 
 FREE DELIVERY AND EXPRESS INSTALLATION
 
 REPLACMENT POLICY - Any request for replacement of a Product that was damaged at the time of Delivery should be made within 5 days of Delivery. Product will be replaced by the Seller as per Brand’s replacment policy.

descriptor.name: Whitemagic Premier GenX 7.5 kg 5 Star Fully Automatic Top Load Washing Machine
descriptor.short_desc:
Spiro Wash Technology
 6th Sense Technology
 12 Wash Program
 Hard Water Wash
 Aqua Store
descriptor.long_desc:
5 STAR ENERGY RATING WITH ECO WASH PROGRAM - 5 Star Rating that gives you best in class water and energy efficiency Save More than 2 Buckets of Water, with Every Wash.
 
  10 YEAR WARRANTY - 10 year warranty on motor and prime mover.
 
  123 Wash -The machine comes with an easy to use 3-button control panel to take care of your washing needs. All you need to press is 1-2-3 and the machine’s intelligence takes over to deliver the perfect wash.
 
  EASYTECH - Smart Sensors - Smart sensors in the machine automatically sense and indicate low voltage and water conditions. Smart Lint Filter - Helps remove any lint accumulated during the wash. Smart Detergent Recommendation - Senses the laundry load inside the tub and recommends detergent dosage accordingly.
 
  ZPF TECHNOLOGY - With ZPF Technology, the washing machines fills the tub 50% faster even when the pressure is as low as 0.017MPa.
 
  EXPRESS WASH - Express Wash reduces wash time for less soiled clothes, thereby saving energy and detergent.
 
  AUTO TUB CLEAN - Automatically cleans off all the impurities left on the inner walls of the tub, at the time of spin, during every wash cycle.
 
  SPIRO WASH ACTION - Now get 20% better cleaning with the new Spiro Wash Action .This advanced Wash motion washes clothes in a unique circular motion giving it a complete through wash.
 
  6TH SENSE SMART SENSORS - Smart sensors in the machine automatically sense and indicate low voltage & water conditions.
 
  HARD WATER WASH - Unique hard water wash program that gives better dirt and stain removal even in hard water conditions.
 
  12 WASH PROGRAM - The 12 wash programs are designed to wash different fabric types perfectly.
 
  SPA WASH SYSTEM - The new spa wash system delivers the perfect wash and 40% less tangling with it's specially designed prime move and drum combination. It contains 50% lesser holes than an ordinary wash drum, giving a smoother wash and also reducing the amount of lint generated. Tangling and energy savings scores are basis the tests conducted against specific models in Whirlpool laboratories.
 
  IN THE BOX CONTENTS - Washing Machine, Inlet Pipe, Detergent Cup, Rat Mesh, Drain Pipe, Drain Hose with Clamp
 
  WARRANTY - 2 Years Comprehensive & 10 Years Warranty on Prime Mover & Motor
 
  CONTACT US - Email: helpdeskindia@whirlpool.com | Toll Free: 1800 208 1800

descriptor.name: 360° Bloomwash Pro 9.5 kg 5 Star Fully Automatic Top Load Washing Machine with In-Built Heater
descriptor.short_desc:
Removes Up to 50 Tough Stains and Up to 48 hours Old Stains
 Removes Up to 99% Germs & Allergens 
 360 Bloomwash Technology
 Hot Catalytic Soak
 Hard Water Wash
descriptor.long_desc:
5 STAR - Whirlpool Washing Machines come with 5 Star Energy rating for best in class water & energy efficiency.
 
  REMOVES UP TO 50 TOUGH STAINS - Get rid of everyday stains with the all-new Hotmatic Technology. It's advanced microprocessor and intellisensor enables the washing machine to analyze data and control water temperature for different fabric type.
 
  3 HOT WATER MODES - Heats water up to 60° C at 3 different levels ranging from Warm, Hot to Allergen Free, offering customized care by offering different water temperatures as per cloth type.
 
  REMOVES UP TO 48 HOURS OLD STAINS - No need to worry about immediate removal of stains. With the Stainwash program, one can remove stains that are even 48 hours old.
 
  HOT CATALYTIC SOAK - The hot catalytic soak mechanism soaks clothes in concentrated detergent water to loosen the dirt, before the agitation. This mechanism uses 1/3rd the quantity of water to create a high detergent concentration.
 
  HARD WATER WASH - Adapts the wash cycle to give you 20% better cleaning. The intelligent hard water mechanism adapts the machine program for washing in hard water, giving improved washing performance.
 
  EDGE TO EDGE DESIGN - 360° Bloomwash Pro has a wide edge to edge, one piece glass lid which gives a better and more convenient drum access.
 
  HEXA BLOOM IMPELLER - The newly designed hexa bloom impeller with 6 vanes, washes clothes in a unique 360° blooming wash motion. This makes clothes rub against each other ensuring superior cleaning results with minimizing fabric abrasion.
 
  DYNAMIX - Senses the laundry load inside the tub and recommends detergent dosage accordingly.
 
  ZPF TECHNOLOGY - To resolve water pressure situations, Whirlpool presents ZPF Technology. Zero Pressure. Fill technology ensures that the wash tub gets filled 50%^^ faster even if the water pressure is as low as 17mpa.
 
  SOFT CLOSE LID - The hydraulic mechanism of the soft closing lid gives you a premium experience and also protects the glass lid from any damage.
 
  POWER DRY - The Power Dry feature has 4 unique drying options – Gentle, Normal, Extra and Power. It provides 4 customised drying options as per the fabric type and its drying requirements.
 
  IN THE BOX CONTENTS - Washing Machine, Inlet Pipe, Detergent Cup, Rat Mesh, Drain Pipe, Drain Hose with Clamp 
 
  WARRANTY - 3 Years Comprehensive & 10 Years Warranty on Prime Mover & Motor
 
  CONTACT US - Email: helpdeskindia@whirlpool.com | Toll Free: 1800 208 1800
 
 FREE DELIVERY AND EXPRESS INSTALLATION
 
 REPLACMENT POLICY - Any request for replacement of a Product that was damaged at the time of Delivery should be made within 5 days of Delivery. Product will be replaced by the Seller as per Brand’s replacment policy.

descriptor.short_desc:
* Upto 9 hours of cooling retention even during power cuts
 
 * Jumbo Storage: 2 dedicated door racks chill up to three 2L-bottles and five 1L-bottles.
 
 * Insulated Capillary Technology
 
 * Auto Connect to home inverter
 
 * GLASS SHELVES - Toughened glass shelves allow you to store large, heavy utensils with ease.
 
 * POCKET HANDLE - It gives a modern and sleak look to the refrigerator which blends in with your tasteful home interiors, also allowing easy cleaning of your refrigerator.
 
 * JUMBO BOTTLE RACK - Store upto three 2L Bottles with ease.
 
 * EASY MANUAL DEFORESTING - Easy Defrosting mechanism ensures stress free use of the refrigerator along with effective cooling.
 
 * INSULATED CAPILLARY TECHNOLOGY - In Insulated Capillary Technology, the capillary which carries the refrigerant from the compressor to the freezer is surrounded by super cold gas leading to benefits such better compressor efficiency, faster cooling and 9 Hours* cooling retention in the refrigerator.
 
 * STABILIZER FREE (130-300V^) - Whirlpool Refrigerators can stably operate even in high fluctuation of voltage (130V-300V) and do not require a separate stabilizer.
 
 * LARGE VEGETABLE CRISPER - Extra Large Vegetable crisper ensures that you never run out of space.
 
 * QUICK CHILL ZONE - Special compartment to deliver optimum cooling for cans and milk packets.
 
 * REMOVABLE ANTI-BACTERIAL GASKET - This easy-to-clean removable airtight gasket keeps the door liner clean and prevents the build-up of fungi and bacteria inside the refrigerator keeping your food healthy and hygienic for longer periods.
 
 * HONEYCOMB MOISTURE LOCK CRISPER COVER - Vegetable Crisper with Honey Comb Moisture Lock-in Technology maintains optimum moisture in your vegetables and keeps them fresher for longer.
 
 * LARGE FREEZER CAPACITY - Large Freezer with Stackable Ice trays ensuring maximum freezer space.
 
 * AUTO CONNECT TO HOME INVERTER - In the event of a power outage, it automatically connects to the home inverter, thus delivering consistent cooling and maintaining long-lasting freshness.
 
 * IN THE BOX CONTENTS - 1 Egg Tray, 1 Ice Tray, 1 Instruction Manual, 1 Key
 
 * WARRANTY - 1 Year on product, 10 years on compressor
 
 * CONTACT US - Email - wstore@whirlpool.com | Toll Free - 1800 208 1800

descriptor.long_desc:
Avant Garde Design - With a luxurious design and futuristic format, the refrigerator belongs to a new era of refrigeration of the perfect combination of aesthetics and technology. Exquisite design with a premium steel finish, sleek chrome band, and beautiful door handle on the outside and infinity shelves with a chrome tint, premium door bins, and chrome UI on the inside makes this refrigerator perfect for any modern household.
 
  Powered by Adaptive Intelligence Technology - Powered by Adaptive Intelligence technology - an advanced network of IntelliSensors, and a microprocessor - it continuously senses, adapts, and controls the temperature inside the refrigerator based on outside weather conditions, the load inside & your usage pattern. This ensures that you get perfect cooling & long-lasting freshness always.
 
  3D Airflow Technology - The 3D airflow technology, with a scientifically designed air tower, strategically placed vents, and air boosters, circulates cold air uniformly in a circular manner. The cold air doesn't hit food items directly, thereby minimizing the moisture loss and keeping the food items fresh for longer.
 
  Super Silent @36dB - Experience silence as in a library with a product that gives super silent performance @36dB. This allows refrigerator to perfectly fit in anywhere from your living room to kitchen.
 
  Up to 15 Days of Extended Freshness - Get long-lasting freshness with the help of advanced technology. The refrigerator has a perfect environment that gives up to 15 days of extended freshness and the best in class vitamin preservation.
 
  Microblock Technology - The unique Microblock technology prevents up to 99% bacterial growth ensuring that fruits and vegetables stay fresh longer. So, go on, stock in the refrigerator, and get that long-lasting freshness.
 
  Up to 7 Days of Dairy Freshness - Adaptive Cooling ensures that milk and other dairy products stay fresh for up to 7 days. Now stop worrying for milk spoilage and store more.
 
  Advanced IntelliSense Inverter Technology - The advanced Intellisense inverter technology - inverter compressor and inverter fan - adjusts the compressor and fan speed in real-time to give you 45% faster cooling. It helps in saving energy every day and is built for long-lasting performance. Not only this, but it also ensures that you can connect your refrigerator with a home inverter.
 
  Cooling Retention for up to 18 hrs after power cuts - Retains cooling for up to 18 hours after power cuts, which ensures that the food items don't get spoilt in case of a power blackout or accidental switch-off of the refrigerator.
 
  IN THE BOX CONTENTS - 1 Refrigerator, 1 Warranty Card, 1 User Manual
 
  WARRANTY - 1 year Comprehensive & 10 years on Compressor
 
  CONTACT US - Email - helpdeskindia@whirlpool.com | Toll Free - 1800 208 1800
 
 FREE DELIVERY AND EXPRESS INSTALLATION
 
 REPLACMENT POLICY - Any request for replacement of a Product that was damaged at the time of Delivery should be made within 5 days of Delivery. Product will be replaced by the Seller as per Brand’s replacment policy.

descriptor.short_desc:

 6th Sense Soft Move Technology
 SteamWash Technology

descriptor.long_desc:
Ozone Air Refresh Technology - With Ozone Air Refresh Technology you get lasting Fabric Protection, Sanitization, Odour Removal all in an Eco Friendly way.
 
  6th Sense SoftMove Technology - 6 Different Movements for Different Fabric Types. 6th Sense Softmove Technology removes the Toughest of Stains with Softest of Touch.
 
  Steam Wash Technology - The Advanced Steam Wash Technology uses the power of steam to remove up to 99.9% bacteria and allergens thus providing a sanitized & germ free laundry.
 
  Wide Drum Access - It's build ensures wide drum access and easy accessibility.
 
  Tough Stains Removal - The New Xpert Care Fully Automatic Washing Machine remove up to 100 stains from your clothes.
 
  Fresh Care + - Releases steam periodically while keeping the drum tumbling gently for up to 6 hours after the cycle ends.
 
  Inverter and Direct Drive Motor - Get a matchless washing experience without any noise with new Advanced Intellisense Inverter motor with Direct Drive Technology.
 
  Add Garment - Forgot to add some clothes while putting in your laundry? Don't worry anymore now with the Add Garments Feature in the New Xpert Care Fully Automatic Front Load Washing Machines.
 
  Smart Wave Drum - The wave shapes on the drum and lifters gently wash the clothes.
 
  5 Star Energy Rating - Whirlpool Washing Machines have the best in class ratings. This washing machines comes with 5 Star Energy Rating thus saving water and electricity both.
 
  Zero Pressure Fill Technology - In High Rise buildings the Floors on the top sure have an amazing view, but the struggle of water pressure is nothing we don't have to deal with. To resolve these water pressure situations, The ZPF or Zero Pressure Fill technology ensures that the wash tub gets filled even if the water pressure is as low as 0.02 Mpa or height > 7 ft.
 
  Warranty - Get complete peace of mind with 3 Years Comprehensive Warranty and 10 Years Motor Warranty on this Washing Machine.
